selected_ideas.selection_rationale: Critical infrastructure that enables all other features. Must be implemented first as foundation.
Quick win that dramatically improves user onboarding and feature discovery. Low risk, high impact.
Strategic differentiator with time-aware predictions. Learns from usage, minimal complexity.
Fundamental UX improvement that removes user fear and enables exploration. High composability.

coverage.risk_profile: Balanced - mix of proven patterns and innovation

synergies.synergy: Storage layer enables persistent undo history across sessions
Compressed storage allows extensive prediction history
Progressive help teaches undo features; undo encourages exploration
Predictions improve over time with progressive learning guidance

phase_1.goals: Establish foundation and immediate UX improvements

phase_2.goals: Add intelligence and advanced UX features

phase_3.goals: Iterate based on usage and add remaining high-score features

risk_mitigation: Foundation first approach minimizes technical debt

excluded_rationale.visionary-adaptive-1: Higher risk with privacy concerns; defer until predictions proven
excluded_rationale.offline-pwa-e1: Important but can be added later; storage foundation more critical
excluded_rationale.ux-shortcuts-2: Good feature but less transformative than undo system
excluded_rationale.smart-context-e1: Complex coordination; better to start with simpler prediction
